original_title: ‘Orwellian’ firing at the American Journal of Economics and Sociology for publishing a climate skeptic paper.  Marty Rowland PhD was fired from the American Journal of Economics & Sociology for the peer-reviewed paper 'Carbon Dioxide & a Warming Climate are not problems'.   — The Donald
article_summary: Journal editor fired for publishing climate skeptic paper, sparking debate on academic freedom and scientific consensus.</s>
